name: Number Wizard (Dapper Cat Games)
description:
This version of Number Wizard was built by me (Petra) during this course from Udemy.com. Number Wizard is actually the first and third game you make during the course. Even though it might look small and insignificant when you first come across it, by the end of the fourth section you have an amazing, fully working game.

I had a lot of fun leaning and making this game and I hope you will too while playing it.

Added features:

  • Randomized maximum number of guesses (yes, it is possible to lose!)
  • Return to Start & Quit Game buttons in each state of the game.
